location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Our conveyance across the desert to Babylon' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:98 x 143 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘43’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterPhotograph showing a horse-drawn carriage described as ‘our conveyance’ to Babylon. At left, four men stand before an archway in a low wall. The carriage at centre is drawn by four donkeys. A driver sits in the seat and another man stands at right alongside the carriage.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'Our conveyance across the desert to Babylon'Pencil, above image at right: ‘43’;’21’
